DESCRIPTION: ¡Administre las copias de seguridad de su servidor de manera eficiente!
MISSING_BACKUP_ID: ¡Por favor ingrese una ID del Backup!
NO_BACKUP_FOUND: No se encontraron copias de seguridad para `{{backupID}}`
SUCCESS_PUBLIC: Successfully created backup! The backup ID has been sent to you in private messages!
SUCCESS_PRIVATE: Here is the ID of your backup: ```{{backupID}}```
CONFIRMATION: :warning: | When the backup is loaded, all the channels, roles, etc. will be replaced! Type `-confirm` to confirm!
